name: Viper I: One
description:
Viper I: One is a project that was made in my Video Game Design course with three other people. However, due to unforeseen events,  the project was not finished, so you will see bugs and unused HUDs throughout the game. It was originally planned to be a metroidvania but with the time my team and I had, we resorted to making it a platformer/asteroids type game.

I have also posted the source code of this game on my GitHub if you are curious as to how me and the other programmer made it work. I designed the title screen and the platforming level while my programming partner did the metroid-type level.

Viper I One Source Code
